class.desc: An enum for how stuck a module/thing is.

constant.name: STUCK_RECOVERABLE
constant.desc: An stuck state, in which it is possible to recover, and move forward.

constant.name: STUCK_PERMANENT
constant.desc: A stuck state due to an unrecoverable error.

constant.name: STUCK_DUE_TO_DESCENDANTS
constant.desc: A stuck state, that is only stuck, because one of this module's descendants is stuck, in the tree of modules.
